downloadTitle: SharePoint Products 2010 Audience and content targeting worksheet
downloadDescription: Use this worksheet to plan audience and content targeting for your organization.
detailsSection:
Use this worksheet to plan audience and content targeting for your organization. Use this worksheet to plan audience and content targeting for your organization. Before you plan audience, you should have already completed the following plans:
  • Plan for Windows security
  • Plan for user profiles and distribution lists
  • Plan for site and site collections
  • Plan SharePoint groups
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Excel 2007; Microsoft Office Excel 2010
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button above to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this file to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
